mapper.select: select a.productnum, a.thumbimg, a.productprice, a.productname, a.productinfomation,a.catename, a.catesort, nvl(d.saleprice,0) as saleprice from( select p.productnum, p.thumbimg, p.productprice, p.productname, p.productinfomation, mc.catename, mm.catesort from product p join mainmcategory mm on mm.productnum = p.productnum join maincategory mc on mc.catenum = mm.catenum where mm.catenum = #{param1} order by mm.catesort) a left join discount d on a.productnum = d.productnum

select * from( select recipetitle, recipemainimg, recipehit, recipenum from recipe
order by recipehit desc
order by recipewritedate desc
) where rownum <= 3
